name: instagram-tracker
description: Instagram Account Tracker - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: pnpm run db:migrate && concurrently "pnpm run backend:dev" "pnpm run frontend:dev"
scripts.db:migrate: docker cp run-migration.sql instagram-tracker-db:/tmp/migration.sql && docker-compose exec postgres psql -U admin -d instagram_tracker -f /tmp/migration.sql || echo 'Migration completed or database not ready'
scripts.build: pnpm run backend:build && pnpm run frontend:build
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd frontend && pnpm install && cd ../backend && pnpm install
scripts.setup: pnpm run db:start && pnpm run install:all
